column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Parisa - Thank you for your great review. It's true -- during peak dining hours
column2: our wait times can stretch upwards of an hour to 1-1/2 hours
column3: depending on your party size. In the coming months
column4: we are opening more JINYA locations in Houston
column5: which might alleviate some of the crowds
column6: but we'll have to wait and see.
